name: Dark Visual Studio Website (VSTS) style
description:
Dark Visual Studio Website style!

If you want to contribute, go to the repository:
https://github.com/fabiencrassat/UserStyles/blob/master/styles/VisualStudio-Dark-Website.css
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://ms-devlabs.gallerycdn.vsassets.io/extensions/ms-devlabs/workitemvisualization/"), regexp("https:\\/\\/(?!code|manage|marketplace|my|www)(.[^\\/]*)\\.visualstudio\\.com.*") {
/*
 * Visual Studio Website Dark Theme
 *
 * (c) Fabien Crassat <fabien@crassat.com>
 *
 * Apply to URLs matching the following regex:
 *  https:\/\/(?!code|manage|marketplace|my|www).*\.visualstudio\.com.*
 *
 * Tested only with Google Chrome
 *
 * Source code:  https://github.com/fabiencrassat/UserStyles/blob/master/styles/VisualStudio-Dark-Website.css
 * Distribution: https://userstyles.org/styles/136568/
 * Licence:      https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/
 */


/**
 * Reset CSS Rules
 */

/* background-color */
body,
button,
button[disabled],
button[disabled]:hover,
button.ui-state-default,
button.ui-button,
input,
select,
textarea,

.tree-view.bowtie-tree > ul.tree-children li.focus > div.node-context-menu-container,
.tree-view.bowtie-tree > ul.tree-children li.hover > a > div.node-content,

}

{
    border: 2px solid transparent !important;
}
.vc-change-summary .changed-files-summary-header
{
    border-top: 20px solid transparent;
    border-right: 20px solid transparent;
    border-left: 20px solid transparent;
}

.menu-bar>.menu-item.hover.icon-only
{
    outline: 1px solid transparent;
}


/**
 * CSS Rules
 */

body,
input,
textarea,
.combo-drop-popup,
.vc-discussion-thread-inputtextbox,
.vc-pullrequest-description-input,
.vc-pullrequest-merge-policy-status-item a,
.vc-pullrequest-merge-policy-status-item a:link,
.vc-pullrequest-merge-policy-status-item a:visited
{
    color: white !important;
}

/* background-color close to black color */
input,
option,
body.Admin,
.build-definition-editor-view-content .filter-type,
.combo-drop-popup,
.content-section,
.context-view.monaco-menu-container,
.dropdown-colored-button .dropdown-content,
.error-section,
.filtered-list-popup,
.hub-view,
.hub-content,
.hub-title .right-hub-error-container,
.menu,
.ms-ContextualMenu-list,
.ms-Dialog-main,
.ms-Dropdown-items,
.option-value,
.popup-content-container,
.search-filter-dropdown,
.taskeditor-header .taskeditor-version select,
.ui-dialog:not(.ui-dialog-legacy),
.ui-dialog.ui-dialog-legacy,
.vc-change-summary-files,
.vsts-header .sub-menu,
.webplatform-header,
.workitem-dialog.ui-dialog
{
    background: rgb(24, 24, 24) !important; /* Close to black color */
}

/* background-color close to grey color */

.add-control:hover,
.all-definitions-list .ms-List-cell .ms-DetailsRow:hover,
.agile-board .board-tile .board-tile-content .child-work-items-summary:hover,

.bowtie button:disabled,

.vc-discussion-thread-comment .vc-discussion-thread-renderarea code,
.vc-discussion-thread-comment .vc-discussion-thread-renderarea pre,

.vc-pullrequest-branches-container-source,
.vc-pullrequest-branches-container-target,
.vc-pullrequest-list-collapsible-tab .vc-pullRequest-collapsible-list-section .collapsible-details-list .ms-List-cell .ms-List-cell:hover,
.vc-pullrequest-list-collapsible-tab .vc-pullRequest-collapsible-list-section .collapsible-details-list .ms-List-cell .vc-pullrequests-list-head:hover,
.vc-pullRequest-list-section .ms-List-cell:hover,
.vc-pullrequest-results-row:hover,
.vc-pullrequest-switch-branch-button:hover,
.visual-progress-total-unallocated,
.vss-DetailsList.ms-DetailsList .ms-List-cell .ms-DetailsRow:hover,
.vss-DetailsList.ms-DetailsList .ms-List-cell .ms-DetailsRow .contextual-menu-button,
.vsts-header .hub-list .l2-menubar > .menu-item-container > .menu-item.focus,
.vsts-header .hub-list .l2-menubar > .menu-item-container > .menu-item.hover,
.wiql-query-result-grid .grid-row-hover:hover,
.witform-layout .work-item-form-tab:hover,
.witform-layout .work-item-form-tab.selected-tab,
.work-item-form-coreContent .combo,
.workitemcontrol .workitem-history-control .left-history-panel .history-item-list .history-item-selected,
.workitemcontrol .workitem-history-control .left-history-panel .history-item-list .history-item-summary:hover
{
    background: rgb(56, 56, 56) !important;  /* Close to grey color */
}

button[disabled],
button[disabled]:hover,
button[disabled]:focus,
.add-control:hover,
.combo
{
    border: 1px solid rgb(56, 56, 56);
}

.taskboard-cell, .taskboard-expander
{
    border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(56, 56, 56);
}
.taskboard-cell
{
    border-left: 2px solid rgb(56, 56, 56);
}

.vc-diff-viewer .code-line.added-content
{
    background-color: rgba(66, 165, 66, 0.5);  /* Close to green color */
}
.vc-diff-viewer span.content-original {
    background-color: rgba(168, 0, 0, 1);  /* Close to red color */
}
.vc-diff-viewer .code-line.deleted-content
{
    background-color: rgba(168, 0, 0, 0.5);  /* Close to red color */
}

.monaco-editor.vs .token.attribute.value,
.monaco-editor.vs .token.keyword,
.monaco-editor.vs .token.string,
.monaco-editor.vs .token.tag,
.mtk6
{
    filter: invert(100%);
}
.burndown-chart.small-chart-container > img,
.cumulative-flow-chart.small-chart-container > img
{
    filter: invert(50%);
}
}
